title: Ticket created from Playstore review d8e07e9b-866c-4421-9516-2ad909ecb2d9
text: Clean interface with not too many add or selling banners like other UPI app. (read Paytm). Phone pe used to be good till recent update. Despite setting up credit card bill payment, still have to enter the card number again! Good for UPI, however, wallet feature does not have wide acceptance that Paytm Wallet. has and is certainly slower than its rivals. Frequency of transactions getting stuck is more, and overall app functioning/processing is also slower, compared to its rivals.

metadata.replyContent: Hi, Adhyatmika. We understand that you want to delete the transaction history. As per the directive issued by the RBI, PPI (Prepaid Payment Instrument) issuers should maintain a log of all transactions undertaken using the PPIs for at least ten years. This data shall be made available for scrutiny to RBI or any other agency as advised by RBI. ∞AR

We suggest you reset your UPI by following these steps: Tap on your profile - Select 'Bank Accounts' under 'Payment Methods' and choose your bank - Tap on 'Reset' or 'Change' - Enter Debit/ATM card details - Enter OTP & ATM PIN - Enter new UPI PIN and re-confirm. Kindly raise a ticket via in-app support for further assistance. ∞RN

metadata.replyContent:
That's unusual to hear, Sainath. PhonePe is not authorised to create or remove autopay. To cancel your AutoPay, follow these steps:
1. Tap on the profile picture
2. Tap the AutoPay setting under the payments setting
3. Select the AutoPay you want to delete
4. Tap remove or delete. If you face any issues, contact us via the Help section. ∞RN

While payments are generally instant, there can be occasional delays, often tied to technical issues at the bank's end. Please allow us to look into your payment.
